name: The Prom King (and other stories)
description:
The Prom King (and other stories) is a short piece of interactive fiction; a mystery thriller in five parts.

Logan, Katelyn, Caleb, Ash, Tessa, Emi. Their friends, their families, their loved ones. A melting pot of normality, small-town Americana, the smell of barbecues and freshly-cut grass. Stale sweat and the sickly sweet taste of non-alcoholic punch. Graduation plans, walks in the forest, making out at the Observatory. Death, betrayal and murder. No life is normal. No childhood is easy. No transition is smooth.

Growing up can be a killer.

Set in the same universe as The Charnel House Trilogy and Bright Lights & Glass Houses, The Prom King (and other stories) is a tale of death and discovery with a sharp, wicked edge.

Warning: This game contains scenes of explicit nudity, trauma and violence that some may find disturbing.
